author: Smallsam99
title: The evil bigfig!
review:
This set is one of my few big fig sets. I got it for christmas and don't care about the big fig becasue I have a use for him! I like the design of the cop cars and it hold up well in rough play and also makes a gool stunt car! Now onto pros and cons:

Pros: bigfig( Iuse him as an evil person to fight minifigs!)

car is simple and has good design

car holds up good.

cons: nothing that comes to mind.

Any way it is a good set only because it serves as a bad guy(in my opinion) for minifigs. I reccomend getting it for about 3-5 dollars.

author: woodall_aidan
title: Wow
review: Surprisingly, this is one of the better 4 Juniors sets that Lego has produced so far. The single figure is okay, but the design of the car is reflected upon in later 4 Juniors sets. With 24 pieces and one figure, this set gets a 3/5
